name: business_units_get_web_links
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unofficial_trust_pilot.
Tool description: This API helps to query data relating to reviews and consumer reports to create a reviewing platform, such as : trustpilot.com
API description: Fetches web links of a business unit using the TrustPilot API.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the business unit, obtained from the /business-units/search or /business-units/search-by-domain endpoint.

locale.description: The locale code for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.
